thread.title: Sheridan Smith nominated for International Emmy
thread.title_full: Sheridan Smith nominated for International Emmy | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Sheridan Smith nominated for International Emmy
text:
Sheridan Smith has been nominated for an International Emmy Credit: Press Association Lincolnshire-born actress Sheridan Smith has been nominated for an International Emmy for her portrayal of the late Cilla Black.
Sheridan, who's from Epworth, has already won a National Television award and TV Choice award for her lead role in the ITV drama 'Cilla', along with a BAFTA nomination for the performance.
The awards take place at the end of November in New York.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Entertainment Lincolnshire
